name: TruSense
0:
”Alexa, tell True Sense I need help”
”Alexa, ask True Sense how mom is doing”
”Alexa, tell True Sense I've fallen”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true sense
Developer Terms of Use
des:
TruSense is a network of connected devices and an easy to use application that provides insights into the health and wellbeing of your loved one.

You must have a TruSense account to use TruSense for Alexa. If you are not a TruSense customer and want to help care for your loved one, please visit https://mytrusense.com to learn more and https://app.mytrusense.com/store to purchase TruSense.
